name: Find and Replace
description:
Find, locate, and replace


Find in all pages

locate accurately to characters

定位精确到字符


Usage

1. Select the layer (search the entire page if unchecked)

2. Search for keywords in a range

3. Click Support Positioning to support batch text replacement


Roadmap

  • Support case sensitivity
  • Support for searching hidden layers
  • ……

more


使用方法

1. 选中图层（未选中则搜索整个页面）

2. 在范围内搜索关键字

3. 点击支持定位，支持批量替换文字


线路图

  • 支持区分大小写
  • 支持搜索隐藏图层
  • ……
